loans.name: Atokhuja

texts.ru:
В течение долгих лет Атохуча живет со своей семьей в районе Сарбанд. Сарбанд находится рядом с городом Курган-Тюбе в юго-западной части Таджикистана. Атохуча 46 лет. Он воспитывает пятерых сыновей. Как и любой отец Атохуча хочет, чтобы его дети получили образование и стали самостоятельными. Он старается всеми силами обеспечить их и дать им образование. 
    Атохуча около 10 лет занимается животноводством. Ранее такое дело было для него лишь увлечением, но теперь стало настоящей профессией. На данный момент Ахохуча занимается куплей и продажей крупнорогатых скотов. Одновременно он на своем земельном участке занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственной культуры. 
    Сейчас Атохуча запрашивает кредит на сумму $1400, чтобы купить маленьких бычков. Таким образом он хочет увеличить поголовье скота и расширить свою деятельность.
texts.en:
Over the course of many years, Atokhuja has lived with his family in the Sarband region. Sarband is located near the city Kurgan-Tyube in the southwestern part of Tajikistan. Atokhuja is 46 years old. He is bringing up five sons. Like any loving father, Atokhuja wants his children to get an education and to become self-sufficient. He is doing his best to provide for them and to give them an education. 

For about ten years, Atokhuja has been involved in raising animals. Previously, such a thing was for him only a hobby, but now it has become a real profession. Currently, Atokhuja is engaged int he purchase and sale of cattle. At the same time, he is engaged on his plot of land in raising agricultural crops. 

Now, Atokhuja is requesting a loan of $1,400 to buy small calves. In this way, he wants to increase his cattle count and to expand his activities.

loans.use: to acquire steer and increase his livestock count

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 63 years old and married. She has five children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for twenty-five years, and she earns additional income from a restaurant.

Teresita is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF. She will use this amount in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Valeriy

texts.ru:
Валерий житель с.Днепровка на Украине. В селе трудно устроиться на работу, поэтому он развивает свой бизнес. Построил большие теплицы, садит два урожая огурцов. От вложенного труда зависит обеспеченность семьи на целый год. 

Зная это, Валерию хотелось приобрести еще землю, ведь как известно земля кормит.  И тут неожиданно  родители решили отдать сыну свой участок, потому что сами уже не могут его обрабатывать. Валерий очень обрадовался,  теперь появилась возможность расширить свой бизнес и построить  две большие теплицы. Средств для этого не хватало, поэтому Валерий решил взять бизнес кредит. Он уже пользовался кредитам от КИВЫ и поэтому знал куда обращаться.

Ему нравится удобный график погашения, где основные выплаты можно делать в конце кредита, после сбора урожая.  Уже в конце этой осени  вся семья Валерия будет радоваться новым теплицам, ведь теперь их благосостояние значительно улучшиться.
texts.en: Valeriy is a resident of the Dneprovka village in the Ukraine.  It is difficult to get employment in the village and this is why he develops his own business.  He built large greenhouses and plants two harvests of cucumbers.  The provision for the family for the entire year depends on the invested labor.  Knowing this, Valeriy wants to purchase more land because it is known that the land feeds.  And now, unexpectedly, his parents decided to give their son their land plot because they can no longer work on it.  Valeriy became very happy that an opportunity to expand his business presented itself and will build two large greenhouses.  He did not have enough money for this and this is why he decided to obtain a business loan.  He had previously used loans from Kiva and knew where to request a loan.  He likes the convenient repayment schedule, where the main repayments can be made at the end of the loan, after gathering the harvest.  Valeriy's family will already be enjoying the new greenhouses at the end of this autumn because now their financial well being will significantly improve.

loans.use: to build two greenhouses on a new plot

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр очень добродушный, трудолюбивый, веселый человек и его дом всегда открыт для друзей. Его верная жена- отличная хозяйка. Она постоянно заботится, чтобы везде был порядок и во всем поддерживает Александра. В хозяйстве у них есть корова, свиньи, французкие индоутки и куры бройлеры. Пока Александр трудится в поле, он  уверен что животные будут накормлены, а в доме будет порядок. Александр выращивает овощи в теплицах и это приносит основной сезонный доход. В последние время соседи-фермеры Александра начали устанавливать отопление в теплицах. Чтобы не упустить возможность улучшить свое хозяйство, Александр решил обратиться за кредитом. На полученные он планирует приобрести котел для отопления и шланги. Александр уверен, что эти средства очень помогут ему поставить свой тепличный бизнес на новый уровень.

Примечание: на фото Александр со своей женой.
texts.en:
Aleksandr is a very good-natured, hardworking, cheerful man and his home is always open to friends. His faithful wife is an excellent hostess. She is always concerned that everything was in order and supporting Aleksandr. On the homestead, they have a cow, pigs, French indoutki (fowl) and broiler chickens. While Aleksandr is working in the field, he is confident that the animals will be fed and the house will be in order. Александр grows vegetables in greenhouses and this brings the main seasonal income. 

In recent times, Aleksandr's neighbor-farmers began to install heating in their greenhouses. In order not to miss an opportunity to improve his homestead, Aleksandr decided to apply for a loan. With the received amount, he plans to acquire a boiler for heating and hoses. Aleksandr is confident that these funds will greatly help him to take his greenhouse business to a new level.

Note: In the photo Aleksandr is with his wife.

loans.use: to purchase a heater and hoses to install heating in his greenhouses

loans.name: Uhai Group

texts.en:
Asha, who is in her late 40s, is a widow. She has three children, who are in school. For two years now, Asha has been managing her family by running a wholesale shop selling soft drinks. She is running also a shop selling clothes at a high trading center. She is working from 08.00am to 06.00pm per working day and is able to earn an excellent monthly profit.

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this is her fist loan request. She will use her share of this loan to increase more her stock of soft drinks. Asha dreams of expanding her businesses, so as to improve her family life. She will share this loan with her loan group, "Uhai," which consists of five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase more her stock of soft drinks.

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es: John, desde hace aproximadamente 15 años se dedica a atender su propio negocio, donde vende mecato, gaseosas, cervezas, minutos a celular, entre otros, está ubicado en un sector muy reconocido y transitado y, por ello ha tenido buenos resultados, lo que le genera  los ingresos suficientes para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Actualmente solicita un crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de surtido al por mayor (mecato, dulces, galletería, gaseosas, entre otros), así abastecerá su negocio para satisfacer la demanda que incrementa en la temporada de fin de año que se aproxima, esto le ayudará a tener mejores ventas e ingresos. John desea seguir trabajando arduamente en su negocio y continuar generando los recursos económicos para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
John has been running his own business for about 15 years. He sells products such as snacks, soft drinks, beer and mobile phone minutes. His shop is in a busy, well-known area, which has meant good results, and this allows him to support his family.

He is now asking for a loan to invest in wholesale supplies to buy items such as snacks, sweets, biscuits and soft drinks. This will allow him to obtain supplies for his business to satisfy demand at the approaching end of year, which will help him make better sales and improve his income. John wants to carry on working hard in his business and continue to make enough money to improve life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy wholesale supplies such as snacks, sweets, biscuits and soft drinks.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en: Narine is a young farmer from Noramarg village in the Ararat region. She lives with her husband and parents-in-law. Narine works in the private sector, in a poultry farm, and her husband works in the private sector. They are the main breadwinners of the family. Narine is also engaged in breeding a livestock of pigs, piglets, and hens, and in the cultivation of greens. Her family members help her in realizing the agricultural products in the local market. As the family’s needs are increasing on a day-to-day basis, Narine wants to expand her agribusiness to more effectively cover the family’s expenses. She needs a loan of USD 1400 to purchase pigs and forage for them. Narine and her family members highly rely on the good will of the lenders and will greatly appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and forage for them

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es:
Juan de 29 años, estudio noveno grado, es casado, la esposa se dedica a los domésticos,  los dos hijos viven con él y la esposa está en espera de otro ya que tiene 7 meses de embarazo, solamente ellos viven con él y el más grande de 8 años está en la escuela.

Juan se dedica a la agricultura, desde que tenía 10 años de edad; este oficio se lo enseño el papá ya que le decía que lo aprendiera bien porque esto le serviría de mucho y hoy él reconoce, que si le sirve para mantener a su familia.  El lugar donde trabaja le queda a 45 minutos,  viaja a pie.

Con el crédito solicitado a Fundación Campo, comprara maíz , ya que en la cosecha no le fue muy bien y dice que comprara  maíz de cosecha, ya que está más barato y poder guardarlo para luego usarlo, en la cosecha solamente le quedo el sacate,  es por eso que también quiere comprar una ternera para darle el sacate y así tiene ese dinero ahorrado en la ternera, esto le ayudara a hacerme de sus animales  poco a poco, la necesidad que le satisfará es que poder comprar el maíz ahorita que está más barato.

Sus sueños son de tener unida a su familia y que no les falte nada,  prepara en los estudios a sus hijos y también enseñarles un oficio que se puedan mantener solos,  ya en el futuro el préstamo le ayudara mucho. Manifiesta, que  los créditos le ayudan de mucho, ya que en el país,  hacer ce de sus cosas sin un préstamo cuesta.
texts.en:
Juan is 29-years-old and went to school up to 9th grade. He is married and his wife works at home. His two children live with him and his wife is waiting to have another child since she is 7 months pregnant. They are the only ones that live with him and the oldest son who is 8-years-old is in school.

Juan has been working in agriculture since he was 10 years old. His dad taught him this trade and told him to learn it well because it would be very useful.  Today he realizes that it is important since it helps him support his family . The place where he works is 45 minutes traveling on foot.

With the loan requested from Fundación Campo, he will buy corn because the harvest did not do very well. He says that he will buy corn crop since it is cheaper and he can save it for later use. During the harvest, only the grass remains. That is why he also wants to buy a calf so that he can feed it the grass. So, the money put away for the calf will help him get more animals a little at a time.  His need will be met if he can buy the  corn at a cheaper price right now.

His dreams are to have a close-knit family, that his family doesn't go without, to prepare his kids for school, and also teach them a trade so that they can support themselves. He expresses that the loan will help him a lot because in his country, without a loan, there's not much one can do.

loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José es un campesino de 51 años de edad que, durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a la agricultura y la ganadería pero, por las dificultades que se presentaban con estas actividades, decidió cambiar su labor por la floricultura y hoy en día posee cultivos con 22.000 matas de hortensias, cuenta con el apoyo de 6 empleados directos entre operarios y maquilladoras, algunos de ellos son miembros de su familia; las flores son cosechadas y vendidas a diferentes comercializadoras internacionales, de esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento a su hogar, conformado por su esposa y sus dos hijos. Su perseverancia, empuje, fortaleza y dedicación le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado, especialmente los que son generados por la inestabilidad en el precio de venta de las flores  y los costos altos de los insumos agrícolas con los que cuida sus cultivos. Sin embargo ha sabido manejar estas crisis y ha salido adelante, motivado por su familia y su labor y, ha encontrado en el crédito una opción de apoyo para hacerlo. Por ello, solicita su cuarto ciclo crediticio con el que desea reparar el vehículo en el que transportan las flores para su comercialización, esto le permitirá agilizar los tiempos de entrega del producto y podrá aumentar sus ventas, mejorando notablemente sus ingresos, con los que continuará llevando el sustento a su hogar y podrá seguir invirtiendo en el crecimiento y fortalecimiento de su negocio. José sueña con aprovechar todo el espacio que tiene disponible en su finca y sembrar más cantidad de matas, tener unos clientes más estables y hacer de su actividad una empresa más rentable y sostenible en el tiempo, para así tener la oportunidad de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is a 51 year old farmer. Throughout his productive life he has farmed and raised livestock. But because of the difficulties that occur in these activities he decided to change his field to growing flowers. 

Today he has 22,000 flowers plants and he has 6 employees, laborers and production workers, some of whom are members of his family. The flowers are harvested and sold to various international distributors. In this way he generates enough revenues to support his household, made up of his wife and two children. His perseverance, drive, strength and dedication have allowed him to overcome the various challenges that have occurred. In particular the fluctuations in the market price of  the flowers and the high cost of agricultural supplies which he uses to protect his crops. 

He has been able to manage these crisis and move forward, motivated by his family and his work. He has found the loan is one kind of support to assist him. José is requesting his fourth loan which he'll use to repair the vehicle he uses for transportation to sell the flowers. This will allow him to speed up delivery times for his product, increasing his sales and notably increasing his profits. Then he can continue to support his family and continue investing in the growth and strengthening of his business. 

José dreams of taking advantage of the empty space he has on his farm and plant a greater number of bushes, having more regular clients and making his business more sustainable and profitable. Then he'll have the opportunity to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to repair the vehicle he uses to sell his flowers.

loans.name: Florefe

texts.en:
Florefe, 37, is a married mother of two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Both of her children are in school.

Florefe has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF, which she will use to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Florefe has been in the fishing business for two years. In the future, Florefe would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Rey

texts.en: Rey is running a fishing business, while his wife is earning a living as a businesswoman. He has been fishing for seven years to make a living. He joined GDMPC recently, and borrowed a loan to cover the cost of fishing boat maintenance. He hopes to gain more revenue, to provide for the needs of his three children. He wants to improve the general living standard of his family, in the near future.

loans.use: to maintain the fishing boat

loans.name: Bahati

texts.en:
Bahati is asking for another loan, because she believes that through it she will improve her business. She is requesting a loan of KES 50,000, which she will use to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, rice, sweets, and sugar for her business.

The previous loan enabled her to save money from her business. She feels that she was able to make a good investment with her previous loan, which to date has allowed her to maintain her level of profits and help her family cover their personal expenses.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, rice, sweets, and sugar to sell at her business

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is a 33-year-old married woman. She has been running an embroidery shop for the past three years. She has gotten a lot of appreciation through her work. She is very talented and knows the art of embroidery very well. People prefer her for embroidery. She makes enough to support her family well.

She has gradually improved her business with the support of BRAC. Due to an increase in the number of customers, she requires more embroidery materials, to cater to more customers. For this purpose, she requested a loan of Rs 20,000. The loan will enable her to meet the requirements of her embroidery shop, which ultimately will help her by generating more cash. 

Salma desires to expand her shop, and she intends to spend part of the income on the improvement of her house.

loans.use: to pay for additional embroidery materials.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
This is Norma. She previously obtained a 10,000 PHP loan, which she used to buy more quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children, and in the family's personal, household and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another loan, this time of 25,000 PHP. Again, she will use the loan to purchase raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables, and other products needed in her business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and cover the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness, and thankfulness in her heart. 

Norma dreams of growing her business and having other sources of income. She hopes that her family will always be in good condition. She meets up with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables, and other products needed in her cooked food business

loans.name: Trilochana

texts.en:
Trilochana is a 29-year-old differently able person staying in a small village of Odisha, India with his parents and his sister. He is engaged in the activity of tailoring. He is very responsible person. From this activity, he earns 2,000 INR per month. 

He has five years of experience in this activity. This business is supporting him to run his family. His father is a farmer involved in paddy cultivation. He helps Trilochana to bring threads and in the delivery of the final sewn clothes.

He wants to enhance his business by purchasing another sewing machine and to keep a worker for that. He has requested a loan amount of 20,000 INR for purchase of a new sewing machine and different types of thread.

He hopes to build a house for his family and save some money for his future and his sister’s marriage.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine and different types of thread.

loans.name: Kana

texts.en:
Kana is a 52-year-old housewife. She is married to Nipen, and they are raising two children together. They do not have a concrete house of their own; they stay in a small cottage. They are so poor that they cannot send their children to school. Both the children are also involved in the clothing business; they sell clothes door to door and try to contribute money to the family according to their ability. 

Kana has one sewing machine that she uses to stitch shirts, pants, blouses, salwar kamij (Indian suits) etc., and gives financial assistance to her family. She is a very hardworking and talented woman who has been pleasing her clients over the years with her qualified service. She wishes to take this loan to buy another sewing machine so that she can earn more earn money to rise out of poverty. 

In the future, Kana dreams to expand her business in the district. She also has a vision of having her own tailoring shop, where she will be able to employ more women so that their families’ economic conditions also improve. Kana is confident that she will develop a good business in the years to come.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to extend her tailoring business.

loans.name: Saboat

texts.ru: Сабоат трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 сыновей. Сабоат занимается купле продажей женской одежды. Она покупает товар оптом из центрального рынка и реализует в розницу на местном рынке. Ее клиентами в основном являются учителя, врачи и медсестры. Она имеет свою торговую точку. Сабоат работает упорно для того чтобы зарабатывать больше денег и обеспечить своих детей хорошим условием проживания. Ее муж работает в компьютерном центре. Он ремонтирует компьютеры. Сабоат и ее муж всегда мечтали, чтобы их дети получили высшее образование. Их сыновья Дилшод и Алишер учатся в университете. Сабоат должна оплатить за их учебный договор. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Saboat is a hardworking woman. She is married and raising two sons. Saboat works with selling women's clothing. She purchases goods wholesale from the central market and sells them as retail goods at the local market. Her customers are mainly teachers, doctors and nurses. She has her own point of sales. Saboat works diligently in order to earn more money and provide her children with good living conditions. Her husband works at a IT center. He repairs computers. 

Saboat and her husband always dreamed that their children would receive higher education. Their sons, Dilshod and Alisher, study at the university. Saboat needs to pay for their tuition. She requests a loan in order to pay for their tuition. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for her sons' education

loans.name: Bina

texts.en:
Bina is a 39-year-old married woman living with her husband, Bhaben, who is 41 years old. They have two children, both going to school. Bina and her husband are very much ambitious about their children; they want to give them higher education and want to see them in a good position in the society.  As such, they work as hard as possible so their children do not face any problem in achieving education. 

Bina decided to take this loan to purchase a cow, so that she can sell the milk in the local market and can earn money. There is a great demand for milk in that area, so it is very much profitable. She also decided to earn money by selling cow dung. 

In the future, she wants to purchase more cows and wants to build a large husbandry business. 

Bina is very much thankful to Kiva and BJS for the loan.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for her business.

loans.name: Ehson

texts.en:
Ehson is 23 years old and lives in the capital of Tajikistan because he is a student of the fifth course. Ehson studies at the Faculty of International Relations and visits his parents on holidays. Smart and ambitious, he wants to be an ambassador in the future. 

Ehson is requesting a loan of 1000 USD to help pay for his tuition. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy timber, nails, varnish and glue.

loans.name: Mirojidin

texts.ru: Мирочидину 20 лет. Он из района Сарбанд. Мирочидин рос в большой и дружной семье. Он живет со своей женой,  родителями, братьями и сестрами. Мирочидин является старшим ребенком в семье и помогает отцу обеспечивать семью. Мирочидин около 5 лет занимается куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. В начале ему было трудно следить за коровами и быками, но сейчас он справляется с животными лучшим образом. Мирочидин решил увеличить поголовья скотов на своем скотном дворе, тем самым расширить свой малый бизнес. Он просит кредит чтобы купить молодых бычков и телят для дальнейшего откорма и продажи. Надеемся, что Мирочидин получит финансирование со стороны кредиторов Кива и его деятельность будет процветать.
texts.en: Mirojidin is 20. He is from ​​Sarband. Mirojidin grew up in a large and happy family. He lives with his wife, parents, brothers, and sisters. Mirojidin is the oldest child in the family, and he helps his father support his family. Mirojidin has about five years experience buying and selling cattle. In the beginning, he had a hard time taking care of the cows and bulls, but now he takes great care of the animals. Mirojidin decided to increase the number of livestock he has in his barnyard, thereby expanding his small business. He is asking for a loan to buy steers and calves to fatten and sell. We hope that Mirojidin receives funding from Kiva lenders so his work will flourish.

loans.use: buy and sell cattle.

loans.name: Kholkiz

texts.ru: Холкиз целеустремленная женщина. Ей 53 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Холкиз имеет большой опыт в сфере купле продажи. Она более 22 года занимается бизнесом. Данное время она занимается купле продажей бытовой техники. Она является основной кормилицей семьи. Ее муж и ее сыновья помогают ей введению бизнеса. Холкиз имеет широкий ассортимент товара и таким образом, она привлекает клиентов. Ее сын и ее зять планируют уехать в Российскую Федерацию, так как они на родине не имеют постоянное место работы. Холкиз не имеет денег, чтобы помочь им. Ее сын и ее зять имеют маленьких детей и их жены не работают и поэтому они очень нуждаются в поддержке. Холкиз запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки два авиабилета. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Kholkiz is a single-minded woman. She is 53. She is married and is raising four children. Kholkiz has extensive experience in trade. She has been doing it for more than 22 years. Right now, she buys and sells household appliances. She is the family's main breadwinner. Her husband and her sons help her run the business. Kholkiz has a wide range of products which attracts customers. Her son and son-in-law and plan to go to Russia, because at home they cannot find permanent work. Kholkiz does not have the money to help them. Her son and son-in-law have young children, and their wives do not work. This is why they need support. Kholkiz is requesting a loan of 6000 KGS to buy two plane tickets. She's awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: buy plane tickets for her son and son-in-law to work in Russia.

loans.name: Narayan

texts.en:
Narayan is 46 years old and a differently-abled man living with his parents, wife and his three children in the small village of Balugaon, Odisha, India. His children are studying in school. Narayan is engaged in the activity of dehusking of paddy by using a paddy hauler machine. From this activity he earns 7,000 INR per month, which is very low for the monthly household expenses and for his children's study expenses. He has been engaged in this activity for the last six years. He wants to expand his business and for that he needs financial support. Narayan said, "If i get a new hauler machine then i can expand my business double and can earn double".

Narayan's wife and his elder son help him in this business. Narayan has requested a loan of 50,000 INR for purchasing of a new paddy hauler machine. He wants to give his family a better standard of living and also wants to save some money for his daughter's marriage.

loans.use: To pay for purchasing of a new paddy hauler machine.

loans.name: Alexei

texts.ru:
Алексей живет в Каменке Днепровской. Служил в Афганистане, потом женился и   занялся любимым делом, выращивает томаты,огурцы. Он  опытный в этом деле, знает как ухаживать за растениями и на сегодняшний день он развил достаточно большое хозяйство, у него есть 5 больших теплиц. Развить такое хозяйство помогли предыдущие кредиты на развитие бизнеса.

Несмотря на опыт Алексея в тепличном бизнесе, в этом году его постигла неудача. Алексей посадил на второй урожай огурцы и растения хорошо развивались и радовало глаз и ничего не предвещало беды. Неожиданно в сентябре наступили холода и даже  были заморозки на грунте, из-за этого все растения погибли. Алексей понес убытки, но он не отчаеватся так как он знает что может рассчитывать на помощь в виде кредита на выгодных условиях. Алексей просит предоставить ему кредит в размере 30,000 гривен, чтобы закупить  семена, пленку и удобрения и сделать посадку еще раз, теперь уже на весенний сезон. Он верит, что это временные трудности и в следующем году приложит все силы чтобы вырастить хороший урожай!
texts.en:
Alexei lives in Kamenka Dnieper. He served in Afghanistan, then married and started in his favorite business growing tomatoes and cucumbers. He is experienced in this business, knows how to care for plants and to date has developed quite a large farm. He has five large greenhouses. To develop such a farm he had the help of previous business development loans.

Despite the experience of Alexei's greenhouse business, this year it has failed. Alexei planted a second harvest of cucumbers and the plants were well developed, looked good, and had no signs of trouble. Suddenly, in September, the cold came and there was even frost on the ground, and because of all this the plants died. Alexei suffered a loss, but he did not despair because he knew that he could count on help in the form of a loan with favorable conditions. Alexei is asking for a loan for the amout of 30,000 Hryvnia to buy seeds, fertilizer, and film to make the planting again for the spring season. He believes that this is a temporary difficulty and next year will make every effort to grow a good crop!

loans.use: To purchase polyethylene film, seeds, and fertilizers for his farming business.

loans.name: Hikoyat

texts.ru: Хикояту 53 года. Она замужем и всегда стремится для благополучия своих детей. Она работает в государственном учреждении дворником. Хикоят очень трудолюбивая женщина и поэтому выполняет свою работу на высшем уровне. Хикоят и ее семья живут в старом доме, которое имеет плохое состояние. Хикоят планирует отремонтировать свой дом, но не имеет достаточно денег. Она запрашивает займ для покупки строительных материалов как краски, цемент и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Hikoyat is 53 years old. She is married and always strives to ensure the well-being of her children. She works at a public office as a cleaner. Hikoyat is a very hardworking woman and therefore carries out her work with the highest quality. 

Hikoyat and her family live in an old house, which is in a bad condition. Hikoyat plans to repair her house, but does not have sufficient funds. She requests a loan to purchase building materials such as paint and cement. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To buy paint and cement for repairing her house

loans.name: Ismatullo

texts.ru: Исматулло холостой мужчина. Он родился в 1989 года. Он живет вместе с родителями. Исматулло работает в государственном учреждении. Он постепенно развевается на работе. Исматулло помогает своим родителям по домохозяйству. Он имеет автомашину, но его машина сломана. Он должен отремонтировать свою машину. Исматулло не имеет достаточно денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 4300 сомони для ремонта автомашины. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Ismatullo is a bachelor. He was born in 1989. He lives with his parents. Ismatullo works for a non-profit organization. Ismatullo helps his parents at home. He has a car, but it is broken down. He must repair his car. Ismatullo does not have enough money. He is asking for a loan of 4,300 KGS to repair the car. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: repair his car

loans.name: Ekaterina

texts.ru: Екатерина трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 34 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Ее муж мастер и имеет маленький доход. Она сама более 3 лет работает в доме пристреленных уборщицей. Она ежемесячно получает зарплату и использует для покупки продуктов питания. Она дома не имеет удобства для нормальной жизни. Она даже не имеет кровати и поэтому спит на полу. У Екатерины ухудшается здоровье. Она хочет купить кровать, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки кровати. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Ekaterina is a hardworking woman. She is 34 years old. She is married and raising a child. Her husband is a master builder and has a small income. Ekaterina has worked as a cleaning lady for more than three years. Every month she receives an income and uses this to purchase food products. 

Ekaterina does not have facilities in her home for living a normal life. She does not even have a bed, and therefore she sleeps on the floor. Ekaterina's health is worsening. She would like to purchase a bed, but does not have money. She requests a loan in the amount of 2,000 somoni to purchase a bed. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To buy a bed for her household

loans.name: Maria Teodora

texts.es: María es originaria de la comarca Las Canoas, Teustepe. Es de oficio comerciante, dedicada a la venta- compra de ropa y cosméticos, el cual ha logrado un avance prospero con sus ventas. Se siente agradecida con Kiva y MiCrédito ya que atravez del crédito logro ofrecer una variedad de productos y tener altas ventas. Solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar juguetes al por mayor, variedad de lencerías, faldas, entre otros, con el fin de surtir el negocio y suplir las necesidades de los clientes. Estima que con el crédito le ayudara a crecer  su negocio y aumentar sus ganancias, el cual le permitirá comprar nuevas mercaderías.
texts.en: María is from the region Las Canoas, Tuestepe.  By trade she is a salesperson who buys and sells clothing and cosmetics, and has managed to be prosperous in her sales.  She is thankful to Kiva and MiCrédito since through loans she has managed to offer a variety of products and have sell many items.  She is requesting a new loan to buy toys in bulk, a variety of lingerie, skirts, etc, in order to stock the business and to meet her clients' needs.  She believes that this loan will help her increase her business and her earnings, which will allow her to purchase new merchandise.

loans.use: to buy toys in bulk, a variety of lingerie, skirts, etc.

loans.name: Sara Alejandra

texts.es: Sara es una joven de 24 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos de 2 y 4 años. Luego de haber culminado sus estudios secundarios ella decidió abrir su negocio y por ello inició una papelería, la cual ubicó en su casa, allí además de trabajar cómodamente también puede estar pendiente de sus pequeños hijos. La idea surgió de la necesidad de apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar, trabaja todos los días de 7:00 am a 10:00 pm y, de esta manera genera los ingresos suficientes para su familia. Su empuje, actitud positiva y su espíritu emprendedor la han llevado a lograr los objetivos que se propone, por ello solicita el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de activos fijos (estantería y vitrina), surtido al por mayor (cuadernos, lápices, marcadores, cartulinas, entre otros) y surtido de artículos decorativos navideños, de esta manera podrá dar una mejor imagen a su negocio y tendrá la posibilidad de almacenar todos los productos que vende, adicionalmente podrá satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de fin de año; así recibirá mejores utilidades y beneficiará la economía familiar. Sara desea seguir trabajando arduamente para sacar adelante su establecimiento y generar mejor rentabilidad, para garantizar una economía estable que le permita brindar a sus hijos una excelente educación y mejor bienestar.
texts.en: Sara is 24 years old, married and has two children, aged two and four years old respectively.  After completing secondary school, Sara decided to open her business - a stationery shop that she runs out of her house.  As well as being able to work comfortably, she can also look after her young children. The idea to open a business came from her need to support her husband with the household finances.  Sara works every day from 7am until 10pm and, with the work, earns enough money to support her family.  Sara's drive, positive attitude and enterprising spirit, have helped her to achieve her objectives.  So, Sara is applying for a loan in order to invest in buying fixed assets (shelving and a display case), to buy stock in bulk (notebooks, pencils, marker pens, cardboard, and more) and to buy Christmas decorations to sell.  With these items she can give her business a better image and she will have the opportunity to stock up on all the products that sell well.  In addition, Sara will be able to satisfy demand, which increases at the end of the year.  This will allow Sara to earn higher profits, which will benefit the household economy.  Sara wants to continue working hard in order to get ahead with her business and to make it more profitable, so as to guarantee stable finances to give her children an excellent education and better well-being.

loans.use: to buy fixed assets (shelving and a display case), to buy stock in bulk (notebooks, pencils, marker pens, cardboard, and more) and to buy Christmas decorations to sell.

loans.name: Nukra

texts.ru: Нукра жизнерадостная и добродушная женщина. Ей 43 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Двое из ее детей не совершеннолетние. Ее муж строитель и работает как в частных, так и в государственных объектах. Нукра работает в производственной организации. Там они производят туалетную бумагу. Ее младший ребенок страдает от грижи. Врачи должны срочно сделать операцию. Однако Нукра и ее муж не имеют достаточно денег. Грозит опасность здоровью ее ребенка. Нукра запрашивает займ на сумму 800 долларов США для того, чтобы сделать операцию. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Nukra is a cheerful and good-natured woman. She is 43 years old. She is married and is raising three children. Two of her children are not yet grown. Her husband works as a construction worker for private and government projects. Nukra working in manufacturing plant where they make toilet paper. Her youngest child is suffering from a hernia. Doctors must operate urgently. However, Nukra and her husband do not have enough money. This is a looming threat to the health of her child. Nukra is requesting a loan of $800 to do the surgery. She's awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: pay for her child's surgery.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan Francisco vive junto a su familia en Cayalti una comunidad productora de caña de azúcar y comercio de todo tipo, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El es conocido en el medio por su labor de compra y venta de materiales de construcción, tiene un pequeño almacén en su domicilio que abastece a los clientes de la zona, sus hijos le apoyan en esta labor.

Juan Francisco ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para abastecer su negocio con cemento, ya que la demanda inmobiliaria está en aumento y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Francisco lives with his family in Cayalti, a community that produces sugar cane and all types of business. Cayalti is two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru.

He is known for his work buying and selling construction materials. He has a small warehouse in his home that supplies the clients in the region. His children support him in this work.

Juan Francisco has requested a loan of 3500 New Soles from Edpyme Alternativa to supply his business with cement, since the demand for housing is on the rise. In this way he will have a higher income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase cement for his business.

loans.name: Zokirjon

texts.ru: Зокирджон энергичный человек. Ему 40 лет. Он женат и воспитывает прекрасных детей. Зокирджон уже давно занимается предоставлением услуги такси. Он живет на столице и поэтому здесь много народа, которые используют такси. Он этим бизнесом обеспечивает свою семью, так как другого источника дохода у него нет. Зохирджон запрашивает займ для того, чтобы купить строительные материалы как цемент, древесина, краски и т.п., так как ему необходимо сделать ремонт дома. Он живет в старом доме. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zokirjon is an energetic person. He is 40 years old. He is married and has beautiful children. Zokirjon has driven a taxi for a long time. He lives in the capital city and therefore there are many people who use taxis. This is the sole source of income for his family. Zokirjon is requesting a loan to buy building materials such as cement, wood, paint, etc. He needs them to repair his home. He lives in an old house. He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: buy cement, wood, and paint to repair his house

loans.name: Gulnoz

texts.ru: Гулноз и ее семья живут в квартире, которая не отвечает стандартам жилья. Она уже много лет мечтает отремонтировать свою квартиру, но не имеет достаточно денег. Ее зарплата маленькая. Она работает в детском садике в должности воспитателя. Гулноз любит свою работу и ей очень приятно находится в среде маленьких, безвинных детей. Она старается, чтобы ее дети и муж жили в хороших условиях. Она запрашивает займ для покупки строительных материалов как краска,  обои и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Gulnoz and her family live in an apartment, which does not meet housing standards. She has dreamed of refurbishing her flat for many years already, but does not have sufficient funds. Her salary is low. She works as a caregiver at a kindergarten. Gulnoz loves her work and it is a pleasure for her to be among small, innocent children. 

Gulnoz strives to ensure her children and husband have good living conditions. She requests a loan to purchase building materials such as paint, wall-paper and so on. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To buy building materials, such as paint and wall-paper, for refurbishing her flat

loans.name: Akbaraly

texts.ru: Акбарали родился в 1972 года. Он трудолюбивый человек. Акбарали женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Акбарали работает в государственном учреждении. Он выполняет свою должность честно. Акбарали имеет хорошую репутацию среди своих коллег. Он работает с 8 утра до 5 вечера 5 дней в недели. Полученную зарплату он использует для обеспечения семьи продуктами питания. Акбарали должен отремонтировать свой дом. Ее дом имеет плохое состояние. Акбарали запрашивает займ на сумму 3500 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как краски, цемент и т.п. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Akbaraly was born in 1972. He is a hardworking man. Akbaraly is married and raising three children. Akbaraly works at a public office. He faithfully carries out his work. Akbaraly has a good reputation among his colleagues. During the week he works from 8 in the morning to 5 in the evening. He uses the salary he receives to provide his family with food. 

Akbaraly needs to repair his house. His house is in a bad condition. Akbaraly requests a loan in the amount of 3,500 somoni to purchase building materials, such as paint, cement and so on. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials, such as cement and paint, for repairing his house

loans.name: Ekhtiram

texts.en: Ekhtiram is a 24-year-old married man. He lives in the small village of Marneuli district with his wife, parents and brother. His mother is a school cleaner and gets 110 Gel per month. His father is an electrical engineer and gets 375 Gel per month. Ekhtiram serves local people as a taxi driver. He needs to install gas equipment in his car to decrease expenses and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables him to get a loan of $600 to install gas equipment in his taxi. As the gas is installed in his taxi, the transportation cost will decrease and the income will increase. With this increased income Ekhtiram will be able to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to install gas equipment in his car

loans.name: Mayrambi

texts.ru:
Майрамби прекрасно сочетает работу с семьей. Она воспитывает троих детей. У нее есть два сына, им по 11 и 7 лет. Они уже ходят в школу. У Майрамби есть старшая дочь, ей 13 лет. Она тоже учится в школе и одновременно помогает матери по работе. Майрамби в течение 7 лет занимается земледелием, работает в дехканском хозяйстве Яванского района. Вместе с соседями и близко живущими людьми, которые работают в дехканском хозяйстве, они сажают сельскохозяйственную культуру и собирают его урожай, получая от работы прибыль. 
   Сейчас осень и Майрамби готовится к осеннему посеву. Она на деньги он кредита купит семян, горючую смесь для трактора и минеральные удобрения. Земля почти обработана, остается только посадить урожай. Майрамби ждет хорошего урожая и Вашей поддержки.
texts.en: Mayrambi beautifully manages work and family.  She is raising three children.  She has two sons, who are 11 and 7 years old.  They already attend school.  Mayrambi has an older daughter, who is 13 years old.  She also attends a school and simultaneously helps her mother with work.  Mayrambi has been involved in farming for 7 years and works at a dekhan farm in the Yavan district.  Together with neighbors and nearby-living people, who work at a dekhan farm, they plant agricultural crops and gather harvests, earning a profit from the work.  It is now autumn, and Mayrambi is getting ready for the autumn sowing.  She will use the loan to buy seeds, fuel for a tractor and mineral fertilizers.  The land is almost all treated, and the only remaining task is to plant the harvest.  Mayrambi is awaiting a good harvest and your support.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fuel for a tractor and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Umazi

texts.en:
Umazi is a married woman with seven children, six of whom attend school and one who is an adult. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past four years, she has operated a food market business selling cereals, soap, sugar, tea leaves etc.  She mentioned that seasonality is her major challenge in the business.  She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the 50,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase sacks of beans, sugar, rice, and soap for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of beans, sugar, rice, and soap for resale.

loans.name: Mnatsakan

texts.en:
Mnatsakan is 52 years old. He lives in Yerevan city with his small family. Mnatsakan is married and has a son who is already a student. Mnatsakan’s wife is unemployed and she is a housewife, so the only source of income for the family is Mnatsakan’s salary. At this moment, he works as a watchman at a private workshop. He has also worked for several years as a construction worker.  For a long time, Mnatsakan has dreamed of owning a car, but each time, there was something that interfered so he could not realize his great wish. 
Mnatsakan managed to save some money during these years, but it is still not enough so he asks for a loan of 1,000,000 Armenian dram in order to buy a car.  The car would be of great use to both he and his son.

loans.use: to buy a car that he and his son can use.

loans.name: Isac

texts.pt:
Isac, de 35 anos de idade, casado, tem três filhos com idade escolar. Isac é Ferreiro contratado desde 2011.
Com o valor do credito vai comprar cimento, ferro, areia, pedra e arame para dar  continuidade a sua obra.
O seu sonho é concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua familia e comprar uma viatura para iniciar um negocio na sua casa e aumentar desta meneira o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
Isac is 35 years old and married. He has three school-age children. Isac has been a blacksmith since 2011.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase cement, iron, sand, rocks and wire so he can continue doing construction work.
His dream is to finish his house so he can provide more comfort for his family. Also, he dreams of buying a vehicle in order to start a business and therefore increase his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, sand, rocks and wire.

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en:
Johnson is 29 years old and runs a retail shop business. He is single and he supports his parents. He has been in this business for 11 years now and it has been profitable. He also sells cereals.

This is his first loan and he plans to use the loan to buy more retail items for selling. These include sugar, cooking oil, rice and flour, as well as maize and beans. He will use the anticipated profits to buy more stock of goods for selling. 

In the future, he hopes to expand his business and be successful.

loans.use: to buy more stock of retail items for selling.

loans.name: Lady Ann

texts.en: Lady Ann is studying to obtain a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at Misamis University in Oroquieta City.  She helped her mother every weekend to earn extra income but her saving is not enough to cover the costs for the educational tour required by her school.  Without the opportunity she receives from Kiva's partner GDMPC, her ability to pursue her educational dream would be unsure.  In the future she wants to be successful in her career.

loans.use: to cover the cost of an education tour required by her school.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Doña Lilian con 36 años de edad es una mujer luchadora, con muchos sueños, muchas esperanzas para con sus hijos los cuales son 4 y 3 están cursando diferentes grados de primaria siendo el mayor el único de ellos que se involucre con sus padres. Ella en compañía de su esposo se dedica a la caficultura desempeñando esta labor desde hace 9 años en su compañía pero siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra ya desarrollar las diferentes actividades. Ella tiene seis años de educación cursados gracias al apoyo financiero y moral de sus padres a pesar de las diferentes circunstancias que en sus tiempos de juventud pasaron. El terreno que en compañía de su hijo y su esposo trabajan es herencia de sus padres el cual está ubicado a 300 metros de distancia desde su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan caminado o en vestía para poder asistirlo. 
Hoy en día ella ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de abono, foliares, formula cafetalera entre otros, para poder dar asistencia a sus cultivos de café ya que la economía de su familia y hogar depende mucho de la agricultura por lo que necesario e indispensable asistirlos para al final de la temporada obtener una buena cosecha.
Sus planes a futuro son los de poder mejorar sus cultivos de café cultivando una mejor variedad y poder fortalecer el patrimonio para sus hijos. Sus sueños son poder darles a sus hijos un buen futuro, una buena educación ya que ese es el mejor patrimonio que ella les podría heredar para que en un futuro sean personas exitosas.
texts.en:
Lilian is 36 years old and is a real fighter with many hopes and dreams for her four children, three of whom are in different grades in primary school. The oldest one is the only one who is involved with his parents. Lilian, together with her husband, has been working in the field of coffee growing for the past 9 years, but it was her parents who taught her how to work the land and develop the various skills involved. She has had six years of education thanks to the financial and moral support of her parents, despite the different situations they experienced when she was young. 

The land she cultivates with her son and husband was inherited from her parents and is located 300 meters from the house she lives in. They travel either on foot or by horse or donkey to tend their crops. Lilian is currently requesting a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative to buy fertilizer, liquid plant food, coffee formula, etc. to take care of their coffee crops because the family's finances depend on agriculture. It is essential for them to have a good harvest at the end of the season. 

Her future plans are to be able to improve her coffee crops, growing a better variety, and to be able to strengthen the heritage for her children. Her dreams are to be able to give her children a good future and a good education because that is the best legacy that she could hand down - that they are successful in the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies in order to care for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.pt:
Teresa de 47 anos de idade, tem cinco filhos, dos quais três vão à Escola e os dois encontram-se fora do pais. Ela sustententa três netos que vivem com ela, e comerciante há mais de vinte anos no quintal da sua casa, muito próximo a um mercado.
Com o valor do vai comprar roupa diversificada, como: blusas, vestidos, saias e sapatos para reforçar o seu negócio.
Os seus sonhos são de fazer crescer o seu negócio e dar acompanhamento nos estudos dos seus filhos.
No futuro ela pretende construir um estabelecimento comercial no quintal da sua casa uma vez que ela vende ao ar livre.
texts.en:
Teresa is 47 years old. She has five children, three of whom attend school and the other two are currently abroad. She supports three grandchildren who live with her. She has been a seller for over 20 years and works in the yard of her house, which is located very close to a market.
With the amount of the loan she'll purchase an assorment of clothing, such as blouses, dresses, skirts and shoes, in order to boost her business.
Her dreams are to make her business grow and oversee her children's studies.
In the future she intends to build a store in the yard of her house, since she sells outdoors.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, dresses, skirts and shoes.

loans.name: Natercia

texts.pt:
Natércia de 37 anos de idade, casada tem quatro filhos, dos quais três têm idade escolar. Ajuda os seus pais enviando dinheiro para eles em Inhambane.
Com o empréstimo vai comprar  caldos, ovos, folha de chá, mayonnaise, feijão e massa para reforçar o seu negócio.
O seu sonho é fazer crescer o seu negócio, diversificar os produtos para melhor angariar os seus clientes.
O seu desafio é ter dois estabelecimentos comerciais na zona onde reside.
texts.en:
Natércia is 37 years old and married. She has four children, three of whom are of school age. She helps her parents in Inhambane by sending them money.
With the loan she'll purchase broths, eggs, tea leaves, mayonnaise, beans and noodles in order to boost her business.
Her dream is to make her business grow and diversify her merchandise so she can attract more customers.
Her challenge is owning two stores in the area where she lives.

loans.use: to purchase broths, eggs, tea leaves, mayonnaise, beans and noodles.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
William is 38 years old and married. Together with his spouse, they have been blessed with two children, ages 12 years and 8 years old. William has a taxi business and has been in this business for five years. He currently makes a monthly income of 60,000 KES. 

He plans to use the loan to purchase four wheels for his car to replace the old ones. He also plans to use part of the loan to service his car and keep it in good condition. He will use the anticipated profits to pay for his children's school fees. This is his third loan term and he has paid his previous loans successfully. 

In the future, William hopes to expand his business by buying another vehicle for the taxi business and to improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to buy four wheels and service his taxi.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent has a profitable retail shop in Kangundo town and has been in the business for 11 years now.  He is 28 years old, married, and together with his spouse they have been blessed with 2 children. 

He plans to use this loan to buy more stock of goods for sell in his shop. These include sugar, maize flour, wheat flour, cooking fat, and bars of soap.  He will use the anticipated profits to start a business for his wife and also pay school fees for his children. 

This is his eighth loan term and he has paid all his previous loans successfully. In the future, Vincent hopes to provide a good education to his children and give them a good life.

loans.use: to buy more stock of retail goods to sell.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi has operated a fish selling business for the past year, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. In addition, she also has a business selling baskets. She faces the major challenges of high cost of transportation and stiff competition in her business.

With the 20,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase bundles of fish for resale. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish for resale.

loans.name: Ma. Candonieta

texts.en:
Ma. Candonieta is 52 years old and has four children.  She is married and has three children who are in school.

Ma. Candonieta is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines.  She requested a 20,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Ma. Candonieta has been raising pigs for 11 years now, and has borrowed from NWTF 23 times in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Ma. Candonieta would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Leticia Del Socorro

texts.es: Leticia, a sus 45 años de edad, es madre de una hija de 10 años y cabeza de hogar desde el fallecimiento de su esposo. Desde hace aproximadamente 15 años se dedica a trabajar la confección, actividad que aprendió realizando cursos de capacitación, lo que la motivó para iniciar su propio taller y poco a poco fue adquiriendo clientes a los que les confecciona todo tipo de prendas, adicionalmente realiza arreglos de costura a sus vecinos, familiares y amigos. De esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento a su hogar y para brindarle educación a su hija; además tuvo la oportunidad de adquirir su casa propia. Su empuje, dedicación y empeño le han permitido sobrepasar todas las adversidades y salir adelante. Esto la motiva a solicitar el crédito con el que desea comprar una máquina fileteadora e insumos al por mayor (hilos, telas, elásticos, botones), así podrá mejorar las condiciones de trabajo y agilizará su producción para entregar los pedidos a tiempo y, así se abrirá paso a tener más contratos grandes, lo que para ella significa tener mejores ingresos. Leticia sueña con ampliar su negocio y comprar más máquinas de confección para generar oportunidades de empleo, ampliar su clientela  y continuar generando bienestar y mejores condiciones de vida para darle a su hija un mejor futuro, próspero y exitoso.
texts.en:
Leticia, 45 years old, is the mother of a 10-year-old daughter and the head of her household since her husband passed away. For about the last fifteen years, Leticia's primary work has been making clothing, which she learned by completing some training courses. These inspired her to open her own shop, and little by little, she has gained a clientele making all sorts of clothing. She also does work tailor work repairing seams and such for her friends, family, and neighbors. Through this work, she is able to generate enough income to support her home and provide her daughter with an education. She has also been able to buy her own home. Her drive, dedication, and determination have allowed her to rise above all adversity and come out ahead. 

She is requesting this credit with the goal of purchasing an overlock sewing machine (serger) and various sewing supplies at wholesale, including thread, fabrics, elastics, and buttons. With these she will be able to improve working conditions and speed up her production so that she can complete her orders on time. It will also open the way for her to accept larger contracts, which would mean greater income. Leticia dreams of expanding her business and purchasing more sewing machines so that she can create opportunities for employment, expand her customer base, and continue to provide the kind of well-being that will give her daughter a bright, successful future.

loans.use: buy an overlock sewing machine and supplies

loans.name: Nikolay

texts.en: Nikolay is an experienced farmer from Brnakot village of Syunik region. He lives with his wife. Nikolay works as a mechanical engineer in the private sector. However, his salary alone is not enough to cover his family's expenses. With the help of his wife, Nikolay has a business breeding livestock, such as cows, sheep, and hens, and cultivating wheat, apples and walnuts. He sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is an important source of the family's income. To be able to continue his agribusiness in a sustainable way, Nikolay needs a loan of 3,000 USD to purchase wheat seeds, buy fuel for agricultural machinery, buy two cows, purchase some forage for the livestock, and pay for the harvesting services. The loan will help him maintain and develop his agribusiness further. Nikolay and his wife rely heavily on the goodwill of the lenders and are thankful to them for their support in providing the needed amount of the loan.

loans.use: to purchase wheat seeds, buy fuel for agricultural machinery, buy two cows,  purchase some forage for the livestock and pay for the harvesting services.

loans.name: Hanae

texts.en:
Hanae is a 37-year-old client from Iraq. She is single and lives with her parents and her brother. Hanae and her brother provide the family's income together.

Hanae is a tailor. She established her business in 2012 and has gained experience by working as an employee at a tailoring business for several years. Now she has her own business and her own reputation, thanks to her speed in her work and her affordable prices.

Hanae is requesting a loan of 1,800 USD. She will use this loan to buy two new sewing machines in order to increase her production. She is aiming to increase her profits so that she may take better care of her parents.

loans.use: to buy two new sewing machines.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.pt:
Cecília  é empacotadora numa empresa do ramo agricola, mae solteira de uma filha com 8 anos que estuda além da filha nao sustenta mais ninguém e vive na casa que era de seus pais.
Com o valor quer  comprar cimento, porta, areia para dar continuidade a sua obra que neste momento esta na fase da viga.
Para o futuro quer terminar sua obra, comprar uma viatura para uso pessoal e casar.
Diz que irá pagar pontualmente e voltar a solicitar mais empréstimos para concretizar  seus planos
texts.en:
Cecília is a packer for an agricultural company. She's the single mother of an 8-year-old daughter who's in school. Aside from her daughter, she doesn't support anyone else. She lives in a house that used to belong to her parents.
With this amount she wishes to purchase cement, a door, and sand so she can continue doing the construction work which is currently in its early stages.
In the future she wishes to finish the construction work, buy a vehicle for personal use and get married.
She states that she'll repay the loan in a timely fashion and apply for more loans so that she can achieve her plans.

loans.use: to purchase cement, a door, and sand.

loans.name: Alina

texts.en:
Alina lives in Ijevan city, which is in Tavush region. She is married and her son and daughter are students at the Yerevan State University, Ijevan branch. Several years ago, Alina used to work as an accountant at the combine, but for the past 18 years, she has provided for her family's needs through her clothes trading business. Her husband, who is now in the Russian Federation for work abroad, also does his best to earn for their family. Nevertheless, a major part of their family's income is from Alina's business. She rents a stall at the city wholesale market, where she sells men's and women's clothes and shoes. As she says, she has many loyal customers, who even make orders for some clothes and at the end of each month she brings them from the Yerevan city wholesale market.

This will be Alina's second loan from Kiva. She has paid back the first loan conscientiously and ahead of the repayment schedule. This time, she asks for a loan of 500,000 AMD in order to buy a new collection of winter clothes for her business to increase the family's income.

loans.use: to buy a new collection of winter clothes for her business to increase the family's income.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 27 years old and married. He and his wife have been blessed with two children. John's primary activity is a motorcycle transport business, which he has been running for three years and currently makes a monthly income of 7,000 KES. Besides this business, he is also a farmer. He grows cash crops for selling.

He plans to use this loan to buy farm supplies for use in planting. These include fertilizer, agrochemicals and seeds. He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children. This is his second loan term and he paid his previous loan successfully.

In the future, John hopes to purchase a plot of land and build rental houses.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies, such as fertilizer, agrochemicals and seeds.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 60 years old, widowed, and the mother of three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.

Teresita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Teresita requested an 11,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Teresita has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is a hardworking and enterprising woman. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family. 

For the past two years, she has operated a food kiosk business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the 50,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans and cooking oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase sweets, biscuits, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans and cooking oil.

loans.name: Luz Edilma

texts.es: Luz se ha dedicado durante 20 años a trabajar en el arte de las confecciones, gracias a los conocimientos obtenidos en diversos cursos de capacitación que realizó, trabaja sola todos los días en horas de la tarde, ya que en las mañanas se encarga de su hogar, de esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para sustentar las necesidades básicas de su familia, tiene la ventaja de manejar su propio tiempo, lo que la hace sentir complacida realizando su labor. Es una mujer carismática, humilde y dedicada a su labor, lo que le ha permitido consolidar su negocio y darse a conocer en el sector. Actualmente solicita su crédito número 25, con el que desea comprar una máquina de confección para agilizar su proceso de producción y continuar generando ingresos para el sustento de su familia. Luz con su dinamismo y con su fortaleza, manifiesta que desea seguir trabajando para poder disfrutar más delante de una vejez tranquila y sin ninguna preocupación, con una mejor calidad de vida para estar al lado de su familia.
texts.en:
Luz has worked at the art of making clothes for 20 years, thanks to the knowledge she gained in different training courses that she took.  She works alone every day in the afternoon hours.  This is because she does the household chores in the morning.  This way she generates enough resources to support her family’s basic needs.  She has the advantage of managing her own time.  This makes her happy doing her work.

She is a charismatic, humble woman who is devoted to her work.  This has allowed her to strengthen her business and become known in the area.

She is currently requesting her 25th loan.  With the loan she wishes to buy a sewing machine to streamline her production process and to continue generating income to support her family.

Luz, with her drive and her strength, declares that she wishes to continue working in order to be able to, later on, enjoy a peaceful old age without any worries.  She wants to enjoy a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Leticia Sobeyda

texts.es: Leticia, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma,Cortes. Hace 8 años que pudo establecer su propio negocio de una pulpería, donde ofrece productos alimenticios como ser carnes, embutidos, rerefrescos, arroz, frijoles,  maíz, verduras, condimentos, productos enlatados, pan, etc. EL negocio se ha mantenido mediante préstamos, actualmente solicita el cuarto ciclo y es por 10,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar más productos como granos básicos, salsas, condimentos, pan, azúcar, verduras, productos enlatados y otros. para la venta  y poder tener una variedad de productos para vender. Su meta es ampliar más su negocio  y tener  mayor clientela.
texts.en: Leticia, 40 years old, is married, has four children, and lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes. Eight years ago she was able to start her own business, a small corner grocery store, where she sells various food products like meat, deli cuts, soft drinks, rice, beans, corn, vegetables, condiments, canned goods, bread, and so on. The business has sustained itself with the help from loans. She is currently in her fourth term. The loan is for 10,000 lempiras, which she will use to buy products such as grains, sauces, condiments, bread, sugar, vegetables, canned goods and more. This will ensure she has a wide variety of products to sell. Her goal is to expand her business and have more customers.

loans.use: purchase grains, sauces, condiments and more for her grocery store

loans.name: Virginia

texts.pt:
Virginia de 32 anos, casada mãe de 3 filhos com 15, 12 e 6 anos todos a estudar vive na casa própria. Ela e cabelereira e exerce esta actividade na sua casa onde fez um pequeno estabelecimento e trabalha pessoalmente.
Com o valor quer comprar produtos de beleza para o salão e mechas para revender.
Tem como plano gradeiar sua casa, fazer uma vendação e fazer um muro e uma mercearia como forma de reforcar a renda familiar.
Diz que irá pagar pontualmente o empréstimo e voltar a solicitar mais. comprar produtos de beleza para o salão e mechas
texts.en:
Virginia is 32 years old and married. She has three children aged 15, 12 and 6 years, all of whom are in school. She lives in a house that she owns. She's a hairdresser and works from home, where she set up a small salon. She provides the services personally.
With this amount she wishes to purchase beauty products for the salon and hair extensions for re-selling.
Her plan is to put up a fence around her house, build an enclosure and a wall, and set up a grocery store as a way of increasing her family's income.
She states that she'll repay the loan in a timely fashion and apply for more loans again.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products for her salon and hair extensions for re-selling.

loans.name: Latofat

texts.en: Latofat is a repeat client of IMON. This is her 38th loan. She is a responsible person and has a good credit history. Latofat is married and has two children. She began her business many years ago because she needs the income. Latofat has been busy making different kinds of salads; she can prepare tasty salads. She has a lot of experience, and year by year has perfected her abilities. She always wanted to have a higher education to achieve her dreams, but she didn't have the chance. She helped her two children to get a good education. Nowadays, she needs more income because her children have become older and have greater needs. She is asking for a loan of 800 USD to buy vegetables for making more salads. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for making more salads to sell.

loans.name: Evelina

texts.en:
Evelina is 60 years old and married with six children.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Evelina is borrowing 18,000 Philippine pesos through NWTF to pay for laborers' salary during the harvest and during land preparation.

Evelina has been farming sugarcane for 13 years and also earns additional income from raising pigs.  She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to pay laborers' salary during the harvest and during land preparation.

loans.name: Catatao Group

texts.es: José, tiene 26 años de edad, está soltero y vive en el municipio de Gracias Lempiras junto con su hermano. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura de granos básicos y café. Lleva 10 anosde tener su  cultivo propio de café. esta producción la vende a los intermediarios de la zona.  El préstamo que solicito es por 5,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la siembra de más café y en la compra de fertilizantes para aplicárselo a la finca de café y así obtener muy buena cosecha y mejores ganancias. Pertenece al grupo llamado Catatao y esta integrado por 5 personas que viven en la misma comunidad, que se dedican también a la agricultura y producción de café. El préstamo grupal es por 19,000 lempiras y lo invertirán en fertilizantes y abonos para el café. En la foto esta Rosalinda a la izquierda, sigue Lucio, Candida, Jose Arturo, y a la derecha esta Reinerio.
texts.en:
José is 26 years old. He is a bachelor and lives in the town of Gracias, Lempiras with his brother. They have always been farmers of staple grains and coffee. They have ten years of experience as coffee growers, and they sell their harvest to middle merchants in the area. The loan that he requested is for 5,000 lempiras, and it will be invested in sowing more coffee and in the purchase of fertilizers which will be applied to the coffee plantation. This way, they can achieve a larger harvest and more income. 

They belong to the group "Catatao," which is composed of five members who all live in the same community. They are all involved in the planting and production of coffee. The group loan is for 19,000 lempiras, and it will be invested in fertilizers and compost for the coffee. In the photo, from left to right, the members are Rosalinda, Lucio, Candida, José Arturo, and Reinerio.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and plant more coffee

loans.name: Joaquim

texts.pt:
Joaquim é técnico electrecista tem 43 anos de idade,casado pai de 5 filhos todos a estudar vive na casa própria.
Com o valor do crédito ira comprar areia, cimento portas, pedra para dar continuidade a sua obra.
tem como perpectiva Terminar a obra fazer uma mini-mercearia na sua casa para reforçar a sua renda familiar.
Diz que nas horas livres faz prestacao de servicos fazendo instalacaoes electricas e que irá pagar pontualmente e voltar a solicitar mais créditos para concretizar o seu plano.
texts.en:
Joaquim is an electrician. He's 43 years old and married. He has five children, all of whom are in school. He lives in a house that he owns.
With the amount of the loan he'll purchase sand, cement, doors and rocks so he can continue doing construction work.
His goal is to finish the construction work and set up a small grocery store in his house in order to increase his family's income.
He states that in his free time he provides services such as installing electrical wiring. He also states that he'll repay the loan in a timely fashion and apply for more loans again so he can achieve his plan.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, doors and rocks.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith has a tailoring shop in Nairobi and has been in this business for 7 years. She is 28 years old, married and together with her spouse they have been blessed with 2 children.  Her spouse also provides additional income and right now, Judith's monthly income is 35,000 Kenyan shillings.

This being her fifth loan term, she plans to use the loan to buy more stock of textile materials for sewing. She will also buy tailoring materials such as threads, buttons and ribbons. She will use the anticipated profits to repay her loan.  Judith repaid her previous loans successfully.

In the future, Judith hopes to grow her business, be successful and have a better life together with her family.

loans.use: to buy more textile tailoring materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to  help her husband to buy more products for his bakery store and also a refrigerator.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto is thankful for the financial assistance extended to him. He was able to buy the needed materials and supplies for his farm. He has had this farm for ten years now. His loan was also helpful in the education of his children. His income from the loan supported their everyday household expenditures. He and his wife are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.
 
Roberto would like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan to buy fertilizers, seeds and other tools for maintenance of the farm. His profits from his business will definitely help him to sustain the family's daily needs and educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart.

Roberto dreams to add more plants to his farm and hopes that his family will always have good living conditions. As a CCT community partner, he meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week, and this is where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.
